summary: WHEN I PUT MY CHEVROLET HHR INTO PARK AND PROCEEDED TO TURN THE CAR OFF, THE IGNITION SWITCH WAS STUCK IN THE ON POSITION AND I WAS UNABLE TO TURN THE IGNITION TO THE OFF POSITION WHILE THE CAR WAS STILL RUNNING. I HAD TO DISCONNECT THE BATTERY CABLE AND REMOVE A FUSE TO GET THE VEHICLE TO TURN OFF COMPLETELY, AND AM HAVING TO TAKE IT TO THE DEALERSHIP TOMORROW FOR A REPAIR.  *TR
